definition: [adjective] Sufficiently large or extensive (Suffisamment grand ou extensif) Ex: The hotel room was ample and comfortable.; The company had ample resources to complete the project. | [adjective] More than enough; abundant (Plus que suffisant; abondant) Ex: The ample supply of food lasted throughout the winter.; The company has ample funds to invest in new projects.
verification_comment: [minor] Definition 1 and Definition 2 are somewhat redundant; they convey similar meanings.; The example sentences for Definition 1 and Definition 2 could be more distinct to better illustrate the differences between the definitions.; The native translations could be improved for clarity and conciseness.

definition: [adjective] absurd or ridiculous (absurde ou ridicule) Ex: The movie was so silly that I couldn't help but laugh.; She made a silly face at her brother.
verification_comment: [minor] The definition could be expanded to include additional meanings such as 'lacking in seriousness' or 'foolish'.; The translations provided do not fully capture the nuances of the word 'silly' in all contexts.; The native translation is not entirely accurate as it does not reflect all meanings of 'silly'.
